name: Beyond Meat Burger
description: Taking all the headlines for the last few years, the beyond-meat burger has been one of those food innovations that has helped shift the dial on how people perceive plant-based food in general.

name: Summer Asian Slaw
description: A tahini miso dressing gives it a creamy umami coating, while peaches add juicy pops of sweetness.

name: Veggie burger
description: Once the lonely refuge of the only vegetarian in your group, the veggie burger now threatens to knock the beef burger off its perch.

name: Greek Salad
description: Consists of tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, feta, and onions. It's lightly dressed with olive oil, salt, pepper, and oregano.

name: Mexican Street Corn
description: Combination of charred corn, crumbly Cotija, creamy mayo, and cilantro is a hard one to beat.

name: Cheeseburger
description: The addition of cheese transforms a burger... into a cheeseburger.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
description: Ham and Pineapple on a base of mozzarella and tomato sauce.

name: Cherry Tomato Salad
description: A mix of jammy roasted cherry tomatoes and juicy fresh ones. With spiced roasted chickpeas, tangy feta, and big pearls of couscous, it's hearty enough to be a meal on its own.

name: Detroit Pizza
description: Detroit pizza is first topped with pepperoni, followed by brick cheese which is spread to the very edges of the pan.

name: Udon
description: You can’t go wrong with yaki udon for a mouthwatering Japanese dinner dish!

name: Classic Caprese Salad
description: If it ain't broke, don't fix it, or however the saying goes... You get the point.

name: Sicilian Pizza
description: Sicilian pizza, also known as sfincione, provides a thick cut of pizza with pillowy dough, a crunchy crust, and robust tomato sauce. This square-cut pizza is served with or without cheese.

name: Pasta Salad
description: Heavenly tangy / creamy / crunchy / fresh summer combo.

name: Greek Pizza
description: Greek-style pizza, especially popular in the New England states, features a thick and chewy crust cooked in shallow, oiled pans, resulting in a nearly deep-fried bottom.

name: Pattypan Panzanella
description: The grilled squash is a great jammy contrast to crisp cucumbers and bursty cherry tomatoes.

name: Soba
description: They earn their dark coloring from buckwheat flour. It has more protein and fiber than your average pasta.

name: Tomato Fattoush
description: Non-traditional take on fattoush, a bread salad made with toasted pita. This one has a layer of lemony yogurt and is topped with crispy chickpeas

name: Lo Mein and Chow Mein
description: The flavors of lo mein and chow mein noodles are perfect for hot stir-fries with garlic, sesame, and ginger.

name: Neapolitan Pizza
description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil leaves, oregano, and olive oil.

name: Mediterranean Chickpea
description: Fresh from the mediterranean! Only the best for our customers.

name: St. Louis Pizza
description: St. Louis pizza features a thin crust with a cracker-like consistency that is made without yeast.

name: Eggplant Farro
description: Roasting cherry tomatoes gives them an intense sweet & savory flavor that’s fantastic alongside eggplant, arugula, and nutty farro.

name: Chicago Pizza
description: Ground beef, sausage, pepperoni, onion, mushrooms, and green peppers, placed underneath the tomato sauce.

name: Glass Noodles
description: These include mung bean, peas, or sweet potato, although mung bean is the most common.

name: Ramen Noodles
description: Ramen noodles incorporate wheat flour, vegetable oils, and in some instances, extra flavoring.

name: Chimichurri Potato
description: Potato salad in a tangy, herbaceous chimichurri instead of a creamy dressing.
